sentences.en: A honeybee may be limited by having comparatively few neurons, but it surely seems to squeeze everything it can out of them.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂被相对较少的的神经元所限制，但可以确信的是，它似乎挤出了这些神以元所能做的一切。

sentences.en: Bee and honeybee product are the reliable, sensitive and economic biological indicators for monitoring environmental pollution.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂及其产品是可靠 、 灵敏、经济的环境污染生物指示器.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Its useful for Ramulas Cinnamomi to be prepared by frying or with honeybee.
sentences.cn: 结论: 桂枝的炒制和蜜制是有意义的.

sentences.en: He is knowledgeable about the biology of the honeybee.
sentences.cn: 他对蜜蜂的生活规律知之甚多.

sentences.en: He runs to the flowering shrubs in asks honeybee: Little elder sister, How can be joyful?
sentences.cn: 他跑到花丛中问蜜蜂: 小姐姐, 怎样才能快乐 呢 ?

sentences.en: Honeybee hordes use two weapons - heat and carbon dioxide - to kill their natural enemies, giant hornets.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂部落使用两种武器 - 热量和二氧化碳 - 杀死了它们的天敌, 大黄蜂.

sentences.en: Porpolis is an important honeybee product, which has many pharmaceutic effects.
sentences.cn: 蜂胶是一种具有多种药理作用的重要的蜂产品.

sentences.en: Tarantula venom is weaker than that of a honeybee and, though painful, is virtually harmless to humans.
sentences.cn: 狼蛛毒液的毒性比蜜蜂的都弱，被它咬一口尽管很疼，但事实上对人体无害。

sentences.en: The collection of bee venom by electric shocking is not beneficial to honeybee population and production.
sentences.cn: 电取蜂毒不利于蜜蜂群势发展和养蜂生产.

sentences.en: The genome of the honeybee is yielding some clues.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂基因图提供了一些线索.

sentences.en: The tau fluvalinate is one kind of high efficient acaricides for honeybee.
sentences.cn: 氟胺氰菊酯是一种用于蜜蜂的高效杀螨剂.

sentences.en: This training will work only if the experiment follows the honeybee's natural 24 - hour rhythm.
sentences.cn: 只有当实验遵循蜜蜂24小时的自然节拍时,这种训练才能奏效.

sentences.en: When a honeybee takes its first flight, it immediately releases its strong smelling meconium.
sentences.cn: 蜕变后的蜜蜂第一次起飞时，它会立刻将难闻的“蛹便”丢弃。
